objects.text:
• ICONIC BACKPACK & SNEAKERS
• PREMIUM CANVAS MATERIAL
• SIGNATURE COMFORT INSOLES
• VERSATILE BLACK & WHITE DESIGN

product_details.name: Converse Ultimate Style Pack - Classic Backpack & Sneaker Combo
product_details.description:
• Sleek black Converse backpack with iconic star chevron logo
• Classic high-top Chuck Taylor All-Star sneaker in timeless black canvas
• Sporty white and grey low-top sneakers for versatile style
• Durable backpack with spacious main compartment and front zip pocket
• Signature white rubber toe cap and sole on high-top sneakers
• Comfortable cushioned insoles in both shoe styles
• Premium quality canvas material for long-lasting wear
• Authentic Converse branding and design elements
• Perfect combination for school, sports, or casual everyday use
• Versatile black and white color scheme matches any outfit

banner_details:
This banner features a striking and modern composition designed to promote a stylish product bundle. The layout is structured with a four-quadrant dark-toned grid background and subtle white line and diamond overlays adding a sense of depth and dynamism. Positioned at the top-left, a prominent bold headline (ID: "heading") commands attention in large all-caps typography, followed by a stacked bold subheading (ID: "subheading") enhancing emphasis. The center-right showcases a high-quality product image (ID: "product_image") displaying a backpack and two pairs of sneakers. Below, a clean, minimalist feature list (ID: "description") outlines key selling points in a sleek typeface. The price tag (ID: "price") and a call-to-action button (ID: "cta" and "cta_background") complete the visual hierarchy for clear conversion.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: #000000
- Graphite Gray: #222222
- Charcoal Gray: #333333
- Onyx Black: #111111
- Pure White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a sleek and modern aesthetic with a monochrome color palette emphasizing contrast and simplicity. Key colors include deep black (#000000) for the backpack and high-top sneaker base, complemented by crisp white (#FFFFFF) used for logos, soles, and design details. Shades of gray (#A9A9A9 and #696969) appear on the low-top sneakers to create a layered and dynamic effect. The colors blend subtly, enhancing form and depth, while white is strategically used to highlight branding and structure. This refined palette communicates urban style and versatility, perfect for a contemporary advertisement banner targeting youthful, streetwear-savvy consumers.
